about_the_game:
The tutorial section of 1899: Secrets Of The Maze is designed to help you learn the fundamental mechanics of the game. In this short chapter, you will:

  • Movement Controls: Learn how to guide your character using the keyboard or a gamepad, overcome obstacles, and collect clues.

  • Simple Puzzles: The initial puzzles will prepare you for more challenging obstacles that lie ahead. Examine your surroundings, interact with objects, and make use of the clues you find.

  • Core Mechanics: Get familiar with the basic features (running, jumping, interaction, etc.) that will help you understand the game’s atmosphere and progression system.

By the time you’ve finished the tutorial, you’ll be ready to navigate the maze with confidence and embark on bigger adventures in these history-filled corridors. Enjoy exploring!
